title: Exposing the Undercurrent: Disrupting the GRIDTIDE Global Cyber Espionage Campaign
summary: Last week, Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG), Mandiant, and partners took action to disrupt a global espionage campaign targeting telecommunications and government organizations in dozens of nations across four continents. The threat actor, UNC2814, is a suspected People's Republic of China (PRC)-nexus cyber espionage group that GTIG has tracked since 2017.
